title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 604.3 - Contents of petition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 604.3 - Contents of petition

State Regulations

The petition must contain the following: (a) recitation that supervisors have
authorized petition and the signature thereof, with dates; (b) brief statement of arguments in favor of
formation of authority; (c) request
that commission give the consent required by chapter 847 of the Laws of
1934. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
604.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
